mapper.select: SELECT no,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade,num FROM (SELECT no,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade FROM review WHERE no=#{no} AND type=#{type} ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
